title: Unit Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (Toronto, ON) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: Overall the interview was a pretty simple one, it was a virtual interview. I had met the manager the day prior at Michael garrons career fair and had given her my resume. She requested an interview; it was short; about 15 minutes.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time where you had a conflict with a coworker, and how did you deal with it.

title: ITS Trainer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital
Interview Descriptions: expeGood rience overall - pretty much what you would expect an interview for this position to be. Questions revolve around training, communication, organization and time-management. Knowing a bit about systems and healthcare as well is helpful to fill in gaps and make answers better.

title: RPN Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Ist interview via zoom. 3 interviewers. Reviewed resume, discussed any additional certification (beyond CNO lisence) for the role, sfollowed by situational and time management questions related to the position. Each interviewer took turns asking questions. Some had to be written down as they were vast.
Interview Questions: Starting shift you are given patient load- 4 patients with different situations. What order would you prioritize your nursing care and rational why.

title: Parient Care Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital
Interview Descriptions: I applied online HR called after 1 month to set interview. Had interview with the manager and supervisor. I waited about 3 days for a xall and they got my reference. I waited another week for an offer.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Unit Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (East York, ON) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: Zoom call with hiring staff. Questions were straightforward and looked to understand your skillset and your personality. Weren't just application-type questions. Staff was kind and neutral. Quick to get back to you in relation to position.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you faced a difficulty and how did you overcome it?

title: Unit Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (Toronto, ON) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very comfortable, just prepare well and you should be fine. It's all basic interview questions, nothing technical. Make sure you have good problem-solving skills and highlight them in the interview.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself? 
What is an example of a time you had to think on your feet?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Received a call to come in for an interview after applying online. Panel interview with set questions. Explained the role and then asked the interview questions. Opportunity to ask questions after. Approximately an hour long.
Interview Questions: Background about yourself (i.e. education, previous experience, accomplishments); conflict management/communication questions and prioritization/delegation.

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Interview was conducted by a 6 people panel taking turns asking technical and behavioural style questions. The interview includes a 1 hour practical component as well regardless of the position applied for.
Interview Questions: Why are you the best candidate for this position?

title: RN W/Degree Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Behaviour/situational questions. HR conducted interview with unit manager and coordinator. Received a call 3 weeks later saying I got the job. They were very nice during the interview and let me take my time answering questions.
Interview Questions: You walk into your patient's room and find them on the floor, what do you do?

title: Strategic Business Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (Toronto, ON) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Combination of personal and behavioural questions
Very quick turn around after interview
Conversation based interview"
Friendly panel, 2:1
Carried out at hospital with Supervisor and Alumni of School
Great work environment, overall loved working and interviewing there

title: Unit Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (Toronto, ON) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Must apply to job postings online. Hiring manager will contact you either by phone or e-mail to request an interview. You will also need to do a computer skills, literacy and type speed test. If you get a job offer and accept, it is standard hospital regulations to get a bunch of shots, blood test and TB testing done. This will be the part that takes the longest.
Interview Questions: Very standard questions... "How did you hear about us?" "What do you know about Michael Garron Hospital?" "Have you ever been involved in a customer experience related conflict and if so, how did you address it?" (If you haven't, then you have to talk about what you WOULD do) etc.

title: Human Resources Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (Toronto, ON) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with 3 individuals -- 2 were at the manager level. It was round table type of questions, with a mixture of behavioral and situational questions. Some questions were difficult, but mostly they were straight forward and had to do with customer service. Had to do a typing, excel, and word quiz at the end. Overall interview took 3 hours, so it was quite long.
Interview Questions: When is it better to use written communication over verbal?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital (Toronto, ON) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: Call for an interview. 8 staff present at the interview - rotate asking questions. Questions related to the role, scenarios - what would you do if. Questions related to previous experience in a hospital setting.
Interview Questions: What is your understanding of client centred care?

title: Supervisr, Surgery Health Service Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Michael Garron Hospital in Sept 2013
Interview Descriptions: Initial phone interview advancing to a face-to-face interview.  Pleasant and open experience with a panel consisting of the Manager, HR representative, Supervisor and Nursing Practice Leader.  Excellent questions that pertained to the position.  Very professional with scripted questions to allow for fairness for all candidates.
Interview Questions: What makes you the best candidate for this position?
